Job DescriptionBeing one of the biggest pharmaceutical firms in the world, this company is transforming the pharmaceutical sector. Their team that is responsible for their research and development has concentrated heavily on producing goods and machinery that propel the development of aesthetic medicine. They recently debuted a brand-new, cutting-edge SaaS platform for consumers and Physicians, giving the most complete selection of science-based products accessible. They are hiring for a Director of Product. This is a remote, full-time position.We're searching for a Director of Product as we prepare to introduce a new suite of game-changing innovations on our widely accepted platform. If you want to have the support of a very big corporation while working in a startup-oriented atmosphere this role is for you! You will direct the vision and execution of the product roadmap in your capacity as Director of Product. You will assist in establishing and managing a group of Product Managers who will participate in various cross-functional Scrum teams.Required Skills & ExperienceBachelor's degree in a technical field such as Computer Science, Engineering, or related field8+ years of experience in product management, with a proven track record of launching successful productsStrong strategic thinking and leadership skillsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsExperience with Agile methodologies and project management toolsKnowledge of data science, AI, and machine learning technologies What You Will Be DoingTech BreakdownDevelop and execute the product vision and strategy for Allergan Data LabsCollaborate with cross-functional teams, including engineering, data science, sales, and marketing, to bring new products to marketConduct market research and analysis to identify new opportunities and inform product decisionsOversee the entire product development life cycle, from ideation to launch and post-launch optimizationWork with key stakeholders to understand customer needs and incorporate feedback into product developmentLead the product management team, providing mentorship and guidance to ensure success You Will Receive The Following BenefitsMedical Insurance Dental BenefitsVision BenefitsPaid Time Off (PTO)401(k)Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis now and in the future*Research show that women and underrepresented groups only apply to jobs only if they feel they meet 100% of the qualifications. Motion Recruitment encourages you to break that statistic and apply. No one ever meets all the qualifications. We look forward to your application.Motion Recruitment provides IT Staffing Solutions (Contract, Contract-to-Hire, and Direct Hire) across 11 major North American markets. Our unique expertise in today’s highest demand tech skill sets, paired with our deep networks and knowledge of our local technology markets, results in an exemplary track record with candidates and clients.Posted By: Gabrielle Shaver
